justification: Offer ignores B’s conservative, consensus-driven preferences. Trading Flores (steady touches, friendly playoff slate) guts B’s RB floor, while Eric Torres is a volatile deep threat with tough playoff matchups and inconsistent targets—misaligned with B’s values. Trevor Roberts is redundant behind B’s Tier 1 QB. TE swap (Liam Adams) is marginal; not a meaningful sweetener. Rationale focuses only on A’s needs; no case for B. Internally feasible but poorly targeted to B’s incentives.
